    • Method Detail

      • generateNeededTilePositions

        public static java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> generateNeededTilePositions(bwapi.UnitType unitType,
                                                                                bwapi.TilePosition targetTilePosition)
        Function for finding all required TilePositions of a building plus a additional row at the bottom, if the building can train Units.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the UnitType whose TilePositions are going to be calculated.
        targetTilePosition - the TilePosition the Unit is going to be constructed / targeted at.
        Returns:
        a HashSet containing all TilePositions that the constructed Unit would have if it was constructed at the targetTilePosition.

      • addAdditionalAddonSpace

        public static void addAdditionalAddonSpace(bwapi.UnitType unitType,
                                           bwapi.TilePosition targetTilePosition,
                                           java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TilePosition> neededTilePositions)
        Function for adding additional TilePositions to the normal required space of the UnitType based on the addon that it is able to construct.
        Parameters:
        unitType - the UnitType that is going to be constructed and whose possible addon is going to be considered.
        targetTilePosition - the TilePosition that is targeted for the UnitType's construction.
        neededTilePositions - the HashSet of already needed TilePositions to which the addon ones are going to be added.
